member.name: T:ClassLibrary.Car
member.summary: This class represents a car. It has a LicensePlate and a Date property. It contains two methods. Price, and VehicleType.

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: A method that returns the type of the vehicle. It takes no parameters. Declared in the parent class: Vehicle;
member.returns: a string value, the type of the vehicle.

member.name: T:ClassLibrary.MC
member.summary: This class represents a MotorCycle. It has a LicencePlate and a Date property and a Price and a Type method.

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: A method that returns the type of the vehicle. It takes no parameters.
member.returns: a string value, the type of the vehicle.

member.name: T:ClassLibrary.Vehicle
member.summary: A base class for all the vehicles. It contains 2 properties, LicensePlate and Date. It also contains 2 methods that must be implemented in the child classes: Price and VehicleType.

member.name: P:ClassLibrary.Vehicle.LicensePlate
member.summary: The license plate of the vehicle.

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Vehicle.Price(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A method that returns the price of the ticket. Takes 2 parameters, the basic price of the ticket and a boolen value if brobizz was used or not.
member.returns: a double value, the price of the ticket.

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Vehicle.VehicleType
member.summary: A method that returns the type of the vehicle. It takes no parameters.
member.returns: a string value, the type of the vehicle.

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Vehicle.CheckLicensePlateLength(System.String)
member.summary: Method that checks the length of the License Plate
member.returns: Returns a true value if the license plate is correct.
